name: A. Cards with Numbers
statement:
Petya has got cards, each card contains some integer. The numbers on the
cards can be the same. Let’s index all cards by consecutive integers
from to . We’ll denote the number that is written on a card with number
, as . In order to play one entertaining game with his friends, Petya
needs to split the cards into pairs so that each pair had equal numbers
on the cards. Help Petya do that.
